project_name.justification: The project is explicitly named in the document: 'Project Liberty Lithium / SaltFire Flat, California USA'.

company_name.justification: The buyer is identified in the transaction terms: 'Buyer QX Resources Limited (QXR) and its US subsidiary (and nominees)'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The Managing Director of the buyer, QX Resources, is named: 'QXR Managing Director, Steve Promnitz, said...'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The restructured agreement gives QX Resources an option for a 25% interest: 'Option to acquire 25% of IGL which holds the Project (25,300 acres)'.

primary_commodity.justification: The project is described as a lithium project throughout the text, for example: 'QXR secures option to additional prospective US lithium Brine Projects' and 'Liberty Lithium Brine Project'.

verified_article_link.justification: No URL was provided in the source documents. The content is verified to be about the Liberty Lithium project as it details the restructuring of the option agreement for this specific project.

currency.justification: The currency for the option payment is specified as US dollars: 'Option Payments to Vendor US$500,000 on or before 30 June 2025'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The cash payment for the option on the Liberty Lithium project is explicitly stated: 'Option Payments to Vendor US$500,000 on or before 30 June 2025'. This is part of the 'IGL Variation Agreement' for the Liberty Lithium project.

share_payments_raw.justification: No share payments are mentioned as part of the consideration for the Liberty Lithium project option.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The consideration is explicitly defined as a cash payment, so this field is not applicable.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares are being issued as part of the consideration for the Liberty Lithium project option.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: Share warrants are not mentioned in the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: The payment is a cash payment made to secure an option, not a payment in the form of stock options.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares are being issued, so there is no associated share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters is mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No monetary exploration commitment is mentioned for the Liberty Lithium project in the text.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) is mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The area of the project is stated in the key commercial terms for the Liberty Lithium project: 'Option to acquire 25% of IGL which holds the Project (25,300 acres)'.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the project area is specified as acres: 'Option to acquire 25% of IGL which holds the Project (25,300 acres)'.

resource_size.justification: The text mentions future exploration plans ('permitting for new drill sites at the Liberty Lithium Brine Project') but does not contain a quantified mineral resource estimate.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are explicitly stated in the document: 'QX Resources Limited (ASX: QXR, ‘QXR’)'.
